statements: UPDATE NetworkConfigurations SET subnet_mask = '255.255.255.0', dns_server = '8.8.8.8' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE NetworkConfigurations SET network_name = 'Office Network', gateway_address = '192.168.0.1' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE NetworkConfigurations SET ip_address='192.168.1.100', subnet_mask='255.255.255.0' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE NetworkConfigurations SET subnet_mask='255.255.255.0', gateway_address='192.168.1.1' WHERE network_name='Office Network';
UPDATE network_settings SET gateway='192.168.1.1', subnet_mask='255.255.255.0', ip_address='192.168.1.10', interface_name='eth0' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE switch_mapping SET switch_name='Switch_A', port_number=24, interface_id=2 WHERE id=3;
UPDATE network_settings SET ip_address = '192.168.1.100', subnet_mask = '255.255.255.0', gateway = '192.168.1.1' WHERE interface_name = 'eth0';
UPDATE switch_mapping SET port_number = 5, switch_name = 'Switch-02', interface_id = 2 WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE NetworkDevices SET status = TRUE WHERE device_id = 1;
UPDATE NetworkSettings SET setting_value = '192.168.1.100' WHERE setting_name = 'IP Address';
UPDATE NetworkDevices SET device_name = 'Router1', ip_address = '192.168.1.1' WHERE device_id = 1;
UPDATE NetworkSettings SET setting_value = 'enabled' WHERE setting_name = 'firewall';
UPDATE NetworkDevices SET device_name = 'Router' WHERE device_id = 1;
UPDATE NetworkLogs SET log_message = 'Device restarted' WHERE device_id = 2;
UPDATE NetworkDevices SET device_name = 'Router' WHERE device_id = 1;
UPDATE NetworkSettings SET setting_value = '192.168.1.1' WHERE device_id = 1 AND setting_name = 'IP Address';
UPDATE network_config SET ip_address='192.168.1.10', subnet_mask='255.255.255.0' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE device SET device_type='Router', configuration_id=2 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE network_config SET name='Production', ip_address='192.168.1.10' WHERE id=1
UPDATE device SET device_name='Switch 1', device_type='Managed', configuration_id=1 WHERE id=1
